metadata.name: Whoami Utility Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of whoami, which is often used by attackers after exploitation / privilege escalation

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\whoami.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('whoami.exe'))

output.summary: Detects the execution of whoami, which is often used by attackers after exploitation / privilege escalation

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Admin activity 2. Scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment 3. Monitoring activity References: https://brica.de/alerts/alert/public/1247926/agent-tesla-keylogger-delivered-inside-a-power-iso-daa-archive/, https://app.any.run/tasks/7eaba74e-c1ea-400f-9c17-5e30eee89906/
